fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Fair competition; Single European Skies; Climate Change; foreign direct investment, Strategic Aviation Package
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Etihad Airways, the national airline of the United Arab Emirates, flies to over 120 passenger and cargo destinations worldwide from its base in Abu Dhabi.  
 
Etihad Airways is part of the Etihad Aviation group that also holds minority equity investments in Air Seychelles, Virgin Australia, Air Serbia, Jet Airways.
